definitions.definition: The abnormal hardening of body tissues, such as an artery ; the appearance of hardenings , indurations , lesions , nodules .
Inability to create change or excessive resistance to change.

main_definition: ( pathology ) The abnormal hardening of body tissues, such as an artery ; the appearance of hardenings , indurations , lesions , nodules .
secondary_definitions: Inability to create change or excessive resistance to change.
